nodes.text: Dana Dregond was a female native of the planet Kamori. A Glanthe master, she was the Glanthe school's master painter and was designated as a one of Kamori's "living treasures," a rare honor bestowed upon the masters of the arts, around 9 BBY. She was killed in 1 ABY when groundquakes sundered cities all over the Zethusian plains.
